mapper.sql: coupon_item_id, batch_no, user_id, status, create_time, is_valid
mapper.select: select cbi.coupon_item_id as couponItemId, cbi.batch_no as batchNo, cbi.user_id as userId, cbi.status as status, cbi.create_time as createTime, cb.effective_start as effectiveStart, cb.effective_end as effectiveEnd, cb.activity_id as activityId, c.coupon_name as couponName, c.coupon_en_name as couponEnName, ct.type_name as couponType, c.coupon_rule as couponRule, c.coupon_remind as couponRemind, ca.activity_name as activityName, co.org_logo as orgLogo, co.org_name as orgName from cms_coupon_batch_item cbi left join cms_coupon_batch cb on cbi.batch_no = cb.batch_no left join cms_coupon c on cb.coupon_id = c.coupon_id left join cms_coupon_type ct on c.coupon_type = ct.type_id left join cms_activity ca on ca.activity_id = cb.activity_id left join sys_org co on co.org_id = c.org_id where cbi.coupon_item_id = #{couponItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cbi.is_valid = 1 and cb.is_valid = 1 and c.is_valid = 1 and ct.is_valid = 1

select cbi.coupon_item_id as couponItemId, cbi.batch_no as batchNo, cbi.user_id as userId, cbi.status as status, cbi.create_time as createTime, cbi.certify_chain_id as certifyChainId, cbi.certify_time as certifyTime, cb.effective_start as effectiveStart, cb.effective_end as effectiveEnd, cb.activity_id as activityId, c.coupon_name as couponName, c.coupon_en_name as couponEnName, ct.type_name as couponType, c.coupon_rule as couponRule, c.coupon_remind as couponRemind, ca.activity_name as activityName, co.org_logo as orgLogo, co.org_name as orgName, u.nick_name as userName, u.photo_path as userPortrait from cms_coupon_batch_item cbi left join cms_coupon_batch cb on cbi.batch_no = cb.batch_no left join cms_coupon c on cb.coupon_id = c.coupon_id left join cms_coupon_type ct on c.coupon_type = ct.type_id left join cms_activity ca on ca.activity_id = cb.activity_id left join sys_org co on co.org_id = c.org_id left join user u on cbi.user_id = u.user_id where cbi.certify_chain_id = #{certifyChainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cbi.is_valid = 1 and cb.is_valid = 1 and c.is_valid = 1 and ct.is_valid = 1 and cbi.status=1

select count(coupon_item_id) as stockNo from cms_coupon_batch_item cbi right join cms_coupon_batch cb on cbi.batch_no = cb.batch_no right join cms_coupon c on cb.coupon_id = c.coupon_id where c.coupon_id=#{couponId} and cbi.status = 0 and cbi.is_valid = 1 and cbi.user_id is null

select cbi.coupon_item_id as couponItemId,cbi.version as version from cms_coupon_batch_item cbi right join cms_coupon_batch cb on cbi.batch_no = cb.batch_no right join cms_coupon c on cb.coupon_id = c.coupon_id where c.coupon_id=#{couponId} and cbi.status = 0 and cbi.is_valid = 1 and cbi.user_id is null limit 1
mapper.update: update cms_coupon_batch_item set status = 1, certify_chain_id=#{certifyChainId}, certify_time=now() where coupon_item_id=#{couponItemId}
